N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 482.3 - Standards for approving career and related training

State Regulations

Career and related training will be considered for
approval if it is offered by a competent and reliable agency and will enhance
the claimant's regular long-term employment opportunities or provide assistance
where employment opportunities are or may be substantially impaired. The
training need not consist of a single course or activity, nor even be given by
a single agency, so long as the training is related to a single occupational
goal. Notes
